verses.verse: "They <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H376><s%> 'If a man puts <S%H7971>away<s%> his <S%H802>wife,<s%> and she <S%H1980>goes<s%> from <S%H312>him,<s%> and become another <S%H376>man<s%>'s, will he return to her <S%H7725>again?<s%>' <S%H776>Wouldn't<s%> that land be <S%H2610>greatly<s%> <S%H2610>polluted?<s%> But you have played the <S%H2181>prostitute<s%> with <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H7453>lovers;<s%> yet return <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H5002>me,<s%>" says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

"Lift <S%H5375>up<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to the bare <S%H8205>heights,<s%> and <S%H7200>see!<s%> <S%H375>Where<s%> have you not been <S%H7693>lain<s%> <S%H3427>with?<s%> You have sat for them by the <S%H1870>ways,<s%> as an <S%H6163>Arabian<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%> You have <S%H2610>polluted<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> with your <S%H2184>prostitution<s%> and with your <S%H7451>wickedness.<s%>

Therefore the <S%H7241>showers<s%> have been <S%H4513>withheld,<s%> and there has been no latter <S%H4456>rain;<s%> yet you have a <S%H2181>prostitute<s%>'s <S%H4696>forehead,<s%> you <S%H3985>refused<s%> to be <S%H3637>ashamed.<s%>
Will you not from this time <S%H7121>cry<s%> to <S%H1>me,<s%> 'My Father, you are the <S%H441>guide<s%> of my <S%H5271>youth?<s%>'

<S%H5201><s%>"'Will he retain his anger <S%H5769>forever?<s%> Will he <S%H8104>keep<s%> it to the <S%H5331>end?<s%>' <S%H1696>Behold,<s%> you have spoken and have <S%H6213>done<s%> evil <S%H7451>things,<s%> and have had your <S%H3201>way.<s%>"

<S%H3068>Moreover,<s%> Yahweh <S%H559>said<s%> to me in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> "Have you <S%H7200>seen<s%> that which <S%H4878>backsliding<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> has <S%H6213>done?<s%> She has gone <S%H1980>up<s%> on every <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%> and <S%H8478>under<s%> every <S%H7488>green<s%> <S%H6086>tree,<s%> and there has played the <S%H2181>prostitute.<s%>

I <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> she had <S%H6213>done<s%> all these <S%H7725>things,<s%> 'She will return to <S%H7725>me;<s%>' but she didn't return; and her <S%H901>treacherous<s%> <S%H269>sister<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> saw <S%H7200>it.<s%>

I <S%H7200>saw,<s%> <S%H182>when,<s%> for this very cause that <S%H4878>backsliding<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had committed <S%H5003>adultery,<s%> I had put her <S%H7971>away<s%> and <S%H5414>given<s%> her a <S%H5612>bill<s%> of <S%H3748>divorce,<s%> yet <S%H898>treacherous<s%> <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> her <S%H269>sister,<s%> <S%H3372>didn't<s%> fear; but she also <S%H3212>went<s%> and played the <S%H2181>prostitute.<s%>

It happened through the <S%H6963>lightness<s%> of her <S%H2184>prostitution,<s%> that the <S%H776>land<s%> was <S%H2610>polluted,<s%> and she committed <S%H5003>adultery<s%> with <S%H68>stones<s%> and with <S%H6086>stocks.<s%>

Yet for all this her <S%H901>treacherous<s%> <S%H269>sister,<s%> <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> has not <S%H7725>returned<s%> to me with her whole <S%H3820>heart,<s%> but only in <S%H8267>pretense,<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4878>me,<s%> "Backsliding <S%H3478>Israel<s%> has shown <S%H5315>herself<s%> more <S%H6663>righteous<s%> than <S%H898>treacherous<s%> <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

<S%H1980>Go,<s%> and <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> these <S%H1697>words<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H7725><s%> 'Return, you <S%H4878>backsliding<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>' <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> <S%H5307><s%> 'I will not look in <S%H6440>anger<s%> on <S%H2623>you;<s%> for I am merciful,' <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> <S%H5201><s%> 'I will not keep anger <S%H5769>forever.<s%>

Only <S%H3045>acknowledge<s%> your <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> that you have <S%H6586>transgressed<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and have <S%H6340>scattered<s%> your <S%H1870>ways<s%> to the <S%H2114>strangers<s%> under every <S%H7488>green<s%> <S%H6086>tree,<s%> and you have not <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> my <S%H6963>voice,<s%>' <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>"

<S%H7725>"Return,<s%> <S%H7726>backsliding<s%> <S%H1121>children,<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> "for I am a <S%H1166>husband<s%> to <S%H3947>you.<s%> I will take you <S%H259>one<s%> of a <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> of a <S%H4940>family,<s%> and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> you to <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>
I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> according to my <S%H3820>heart,<s%> who shall <S%H7462>feed<s%> you with <S%H1844>knowledge<s%> and <S%H7919>understanding.<s%>

It shall come to <S%H7235>pass,<s%> when you are multiplied and <S%H6509>increased<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> in those <S%H3117>days,<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "they shall <S%H559>say<s%> no <S%H727>more,<s%> 'The ark of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh!<s%>' neither shall it <S%H5927>come<s%> to <S%H3820>mind;<s%> neither shall they <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H6485>it;<s%> neither shall they miss <S%H6213>it;<s%> neither shall it be made any more.

At that <S%H6256>time<s%> they shall <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H3678><s%> 'The throne of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%>' and all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall be <S%H6960>gathered<s%> to <S%H8034>it,<s%> to the name of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%> Neither shall they <S%H3212>walk<s%> any more <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H8307>stubbornness<s%> of their <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H3820>heart.<s%>

In those <S%H3117>days<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> shall <S%H3212>walk<s%> with the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and they shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> that I gave for an <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

"But I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7896><s%> 'How I would put you among the <S%H1121>children,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> you a <S%H2532>pleasant<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> a <S%H6643>goodly<s%> <S%H5159>heritage<s%> of the <S%H6635>armies<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations!<s%>' and I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7121><s%> 'You shall call <S%H1>me<s%> "My Father," and shall not turn <S%H7725>away<s%> from following <S%H310>me.<s%>'

<S%H403>"Surely<s%> as a <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H898>treacherously<s%> departs from her <S%H7453>husband,<s%> so you have dealt <S%H898>treacherously<s%> with <S%H1004>me,<s%> house of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

A <S%H6963>voice<s%> is <S%H8085>heard<s%> on the bare <S%H8205>heights,<s%> the <S%H1065>weeping<s%> and the <S%H8469>petitions<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> because they have <S%H5753>perverted<s%> their <S%H1870>way,<s%> they have <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> their <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H7725>Return,<s%> you <S%H7726>backsliding<s%> <S%H1121>children,<s%> I will <S%H7495>heal<s%> your <S%H4878>backsliding.<s%> <S%H857>"Behold,<s%> we have come to <S%H3068>you;<s%> for you are Yahweh our <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H403>Truly<s%> in <S%H8267>vain<s%> is help from the <S%H1389>hills,<s%> the <S%H1995>tumult<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains.<s%> <S%H403>Truly<s%> the <S%H8668>salvation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is in <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%>

But the <S%H1322>shameful<s%> thing has <S%H398>devoured<s%> the <S%H3018>labor<s%> of our <S%H1>fathers<s%> from our <S%H5271>youth,<s%> their <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and their <S%H1241>herds,<s%> their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and their <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>

Let us lie <S%H7901>down<s%> in our <S%H1322>shame,<s%> and let our <S%H3639>confusion<s%> <S%H3680>cover<s%> <S%H2398>us;<s%> for we have sinned against <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> we and our <S%H1>fathers,<s%> from our <S%H5271>youth<s%> even to this <S%H3117>day.<s%> We have not <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%>"
